alert.note: Alert for San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 5:28AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Mateo County through 600 AM PST... At 528 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Half Moon Bay, or 11 miles southwest of Belmont, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Mateo, Belmont, Half Moon Bay, Hillsborough, Woodside, El Granada, Highlands-Baywood Park, Highlands and Moss Beach. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains
